PATIENT_ID: TEST_RIB_003
ARRIVAL_TIME: 2026-01-21 14:00:00

[TRAUMA_HP] 2026-01-21 14:15:00
Category II trauma activation for 68-year-old male after ground-level fall.
BP 140/85, HR 78, RR 22, GCS 15.
Tenderness over right lateral chest wall.

[IMAGING] 2026-01-21 14:45:00
CT Chest: Fractures of right ribs 6 and 7 confirmed on imaging.
No pneumothorax. No hemothorax.

[PHYSICIAN_NOTE] 2026-01-21 15:00:00
Rib fractures confirmed. Admit for pain management and monitoring.
Will order incentive spirometry and formal pain assessment upon floor admission.
